**Isolation of Treg and Teff cells**
Obtain fresh blood specimens from healthy donors and
Isolate PBMC by Lymphoprep density gradient medium.
Isolate total CD4<sup>+</sup> T cells using the CD4<sup>+</sup> T cell Isolation Kit as the following steps in brief.
Re
Suspend total PBMC in 40 µl of MACS buffer per 10<sup>7</sup> cells, and
Incubate with 10 µl of Biotin-Antibody Cocktail per 10<sup>7</sup> cells for 10 min at 4°C.
Subsequently,
Add 30 µl of MACS buffer per 10<sup>7</sup> cells, and
Incubate cells with 20 µl of MicroBead Cocktail per 10<sup>7</sup> cells for 15 min at 4°C.
Wash cells with MACS buffer and re
Suspend cells in 1 ml of MACS buffer.
Prepare LS column by rinsing with 3 ml of MACS buffer.
Apply cell suspension onto the column and
Collect unlabeled cells that passed through.
Wash CD4<sup>+</sup> T cells \(negative fraction) with MACS buffer.
4. Re
Suspend CD4<sup>+</sup> T cells with 100 µl of FACS buffer, and
Add 10 µl anti-CD4, anti-CD25, anti-CD127, respectively,
Mix and

Incubate for 15 min at 4°C.
  5.
Wash cells twice with 3 ml of FACS buffer, follow by FACS sorting for CD4<sup>+</sup>CD25<sup>hi</sup>CD127<sup>low/-</sup> as Treg cells and CD4<sup>+</sup>CD25<sup>-</sup> T cells as Teff cells.
The purity of Treg cells and Teff cells ranged 95%-98%.
**Assay setup**
Treat Treg cells with TNF-α \(50 ng/ml)
or

Leave them in medium alone \(control) in 96-well U-bottom plates \(0.5-1.0×10<sup>5</sup> cells per well) in the presence of IL-2 \(100 U/ml) for 24 hs.
  7.
Wash the resulting Treg cells twice with culture medium, and
Count the cells.
Label Teff cells with CFSE at 2 µM, 37°C for 8 min, then
Wash for three times with culture medium.
Inhibition assay in different conditions as follows.

\(1) TNF-α pre-treatment assay: culture CFSE labeled Teff cells \(1×10<sup>4</sup> cells per well) alone or with Treg cells \(1×10<sup>4</sup> cells per well) that were either untreated or pretreated with TNF-α \(50 ng/ml) in 96-well U-bottom plates.
Maintain the culture in the presence of 2×10<sup>3</sup> anti-CD3/CD28 beads for 4 days.

\(2) TNF-α co-culture assay: culture CFSE labeled Teff cells \(1×10<sup>4</sup> cells per well) alone or with Treg cells \(1×10<sup>4</sup> cells per well) which were not pre-exposed to TNF-α, in the presence or absence of TNF-α \(50 ng/ml) in 96-well U-bottom plates.
Maintain the culture in the presence of 2×10<sup>3</sup> anti-CD3/CD28 beads for 4 days.
Measure proliferation of Teff cells by CFSE dilution in
Flow cytometry analyses.
Express the results as percent inhibition: \(1
− \(experimental CFSE dilution/control CFSE dilution))
